mixed-citation.article-title: A new genus and species of tachinid flies from Iran (Diptera, Tachinidae, Goniini)

tp:treatment-sec.p:
KYRGYZSTAN • 1 ♂ ; with two printed white labels: “KYRGYZSTAN, Jalal-Abad Obl. / Tien Shan , Kum Bel Mts. / Aktash west of Jangy-Bazar / Plain southeast of the village / 41°41′28.1″N 070°37′59.6″E /
27.V.2013
, 1380 m / leg. C. Lange & J. Ziegler ” // “35.070”; CZB . New record for Kyrgyzstan
. •
2 ♀♀ ; same data as for preceding except “Ters Valley SW Jangy-Bazar / Besh-Aral State Reserve / 41°35′30.1″N 070°40′26.7″E /
26.V.2013
, 1630 m / leg. C. LANGE & J. ZIEGLER ” // “34.995” resp. // “35.016”; CZB , ZMHB
.
